ai-tha-ap314:1.1_0: I was born in a thicket of rice,
ai-tha-ap314:2.1_0: is the gods in time of the Thirty-Three,
ai-tha-ap314:2.3_0: Thinking, ‘I gave food to the man,
ai-tha-ap314:2.4_0: with a clear and confident heart.
ai-tha-ap314:3.2_0: aspiring to the level of the bad.
ai-tha-ap314:3.3_0: When continued existence has become extinguished,
ai-tha-ap314:4.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap314:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap314:4.4_0: This is the fruit of the ascetic.
ai-tha-ap314:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap314:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kakkaṭa.
